text: A huge thank you to the @EnvAgencyMids team, one of which was out with me last night in the pouring rain checking on pumping equipment by the river and this morning the same person was out in waders digging out twigs, branches and a wheelie bin from the beck. #dedication üéÑüëèüèª https://t.co/5WqbqiTx4H
@EnvAgencyAnglia Some of which are due to @CambsCC not cleaning our drains for 5 years, and deleting about 150 reports of blocked drains without action. @stneotsmayor

Its been a busy year for the #volunteers with 800+ shopping & prescription deliveries undertaken 2 flood incidents & traffic marshaling at the vaccine clinic with 1100+ attendees. @BoATownCouncil @PHWiltshire @EnvAgencySW @RosGriffithsCEM @DWFRSBoA @WiltsPrepared https://t.co/PQ1TmRxT2L
